tool_description: An API gathering  Esport Matches informations on specific tournaments
name: Esport Matches
title: Esport Matches

api_list.name: Get all matches from a specific tournament
api_list.description: this endpoint return all upcoming matches from a specific tournament
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-matches.p.rapidapi.com/tournament/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-matches.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-matches.p.rapidapi.com/tournament/{tournamentid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esport-matches.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all esport tournaments
api_list.description: this endpoint will return back all tournaments in this API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esport-matches.p.rapidapi.com/tournaments"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
